Top Hotel Collections Taj Hotels Near Airport 5 Star Hotels Nearby Resorts View All Hotels In Mumbai Romantic Places Near Mumbai For Couples We at Holidify.com help you make the most of the correctly positioned Valentine’s day weekend away by bringing you a few handpicked romantic places near Mumbai. Even if it’s not valentine’s day, you (Read More)don’t need any special day as such to go out with your sweetheart! Wilting vegetation is passé while waiting for a table in restaurants in queues longer than a winding boa constrictor is not exactly romantic. So the next best thing is to take your beloved out for a small vacation away from the noise, pollution and bustle of the city life. Here is the list of 15 Romantic Places Near Mumbai For The Perfect Date Night With Your Partner 1. Bhandardara, Maharashtra 4.8 /5 View 11+ photos Known For : Umbrella Falls Wilson Dam Kalsubai Peak Bhandardara is a romantic place near Mumbai for the two of you to spend two quiet days alone among the pristine waterfalls and lakes in the pristine, lush, leafy beauty of the Sahyadris. You could not give your other half a better surprise! Distance from Mumbai: 163 km Best Time: June to March 7 Bhandardara Attractions View Hotels Read More 2. Lonar, Maharashtra - Land of the Crater 4.1 /5 View 22+ photos Known For : Lonar crater lake Gomukh Temple Daitya Sudhan Temple Remember how you wanted to see the wonders of the world together? This is one of them! Lonar is one of those wonders that were formed because of a natural disaster and became one of the most beautiful things that you will ever see during your lifetime. This 6000 feet wide and 500 feet deep lake is the only saltwater lake in the basaltic rock in the world. The colourful flora and fauna in the area make it one of the most romantic places near Mumbai. Distance from Mumbai: 486 km Best Time: October to March 4 Lonar Attractions Read More 3. Lonavala, Maharashtra - Misty Weekend Getaway 4.4 /5 View 38+ photos Known For : Tiger's Leap Rajmachi Fort Imagicaa If romance is on your mind, Lonavala you must visit. If you’re a couple that gets their kicks from exploration, hiking and trekking, Lonavala is a wondrous dugout for you. A part of the Sahyadri range, Lonavala has a beautiful, mystical quality to it owing to the lovely hills and valleys around. Bhaja caves, Bushi dam, Karla caves and Lonavala Lake are must-visits when you’re here. Distance from Mumbai: 83 km Best Time: Throughout the year 41 Lonavala Attractions View Hotels Read More 4. Kashid, Maharashtra - Sandy Beaches With Whispering Casuarinas 4.3 /5 View 21+ photos Known For : Kashid Beach Murud Janjira Fort Phansad Bird Sanctuary Quiet and idyllic, Kashid is a lovely beach town on the Konkan coast with a peaceful vibe which is at a small distance of 85 kilometres from Mumbai. The overall scenic surroundings, beautiful hills and golden beaches make this one a fabulous romantic getaway near Mumbai for couples who are looking for some time out to celebrate Valentine’s. Distance from Mumbai: 126 km Best Time: October to March 7 Kashid Attractions View Hotels Read More Top Hotels In Mumbai Search Hotels Taj Hotels In Mumbai 6 options from ₹ 11,000 onwards Mumbai Hotels Near Airport 50 options from ₹ 898 onwards Best 5 Star Hotels in Mumbai 39 options from ₹ 6,228 onwards Best Resorts Near Mumbai For An Urban Getaway 26 options from ₹ 3,300 onwards Hotels In Bandra, Mumbai 50 options from ₹ 1,000 onwards Best Hotels in Mumbai 47 options from ₹ 3,750 onwards View All Hotels In Mumbai View All Hotels In Mumbai 5. Panchgani, Maharashtra - The Table Land 4.6 /5 View 16+ photos Known For : Kaas Plateau Table Land Mahabaleshwar The famous hill station near Mahabaleshwar is excellent as a romantic getaway for couples for the V-weekend. The scenic setting, the romantic backdrop and the perennially mist-soaked valley is a great place to spend this time with your beau. Distance from Mumbai: 244 km Best Time: September to May 13 Panchgani Attractions View Hotels Read More 6. Lavasa, Maharashtra - India's first planned hill city 4.7 /5 View 5+ photos Known For : Sightseeing in Lavasa Lakeside Promenade Bamboosa A planned hill station at a meagre distance from Mumbai and an even smaller way from Pune, Lavasa is a romantic getaway for weary souls who wish to dance with the clouds. Lavasa is a perfect romantic place near Mumbai in the form of a road trip. Distance from Mumbai: 187 km Best Time: Throughout the year 5 Lavasa Attractions View Hotels Read More 7. Matheran, Maharashtra - Cutest little hill-station of India 4.1 /5 View 26+ photos Known For : Louisa point Charlotte lake Monkey Point Matheran Two hours, 54 kilometres and yet a world away from Mumbai, Matheran is a getaway so close yet so far from the hustle and bustle of Mumbai that you will actually stop short in your tracks and admire its wonderful aura. Having been declared as an eco-sensitive zone, Matheran is quiet and full of a joyous tranquillity which will fill you both up with peace. The sunrise and sunset from Matheran are sights to behold. Best Time: Throughout the year 29 Matheran Attractions View Hotels Read More 8. Khandala, Maharashtra - Misty Mountains 4.6 /5 View 22+ photos Known For : Rajmachi Fort Visapur Fort Bedsa caves In a list of romantic places near Mumbai, not having the iconic “Aati Kya Khandala” is sheer blasphemy. Nestled in the foothills of the Sahyadris, the misty valley, the lush greens all around and the floating clouds make for a very romantic backdrop. Khandala is one of those locations that you have to go away to in this season, stay in an awesome homey place, warm yourselves by the hearth (if there is one), eat cheese or chocolate fondue and say cute things to each other! A surefire way to get the spark plug working again, right? Distance from Mumbai: 83 km Best Time: Throughout the year 22 Khandala Attractions View Hotels Read More 9. Saputara, Gujarat - The abode of serpents 4.5 /5 View 7+ photos Known For : Nageshwar Mahadev Temple Saputara Lake Artist Village Saputara in Gujarat, in the lap of the Sahyadris, is a well-developed hill resort is nothing short of a paradise. Along with the awesome sights and sounds, it also has a lake and boasts of great sunrise and sunset viewpoints. One can buy tribal artefacts, go boating or simply chill in the beautiful Gujarat hill station. Distance from Mumbai: 244 km Best Time: Mid March to mid November 21 Saputara Attractions View Hotels Read More 10. Silvassa, Dadra & Nagar Haveli 4.3 /5 View 11+ photos Known For : Lion Safari Wildlife Park Vanganga Lake Island Garden Take lush greenery of the western ghats, add Portuguese colonial heritage, exotic resorts and spice it with cheap booze. Moreover, there you have, one of the romantic places near Mumbai that most people don’t think about. Silvasa is teeming with romantic locales, be it beautifully laid out parks or lakes and riverbanks. Go here to unwind and catch up on some quality time with your better half. Distance from Mumbai: 171 km Best Time: November to June 10 Silvassa Attractions View Hotels Read More 11. Diu, Daman and Diu - A mini-Goa 4.0 /5 View 33+ photos Known For : Naida Caves Nagoa Beach Gangeshwar Mahadev Temple This one is a bonus option if you can fit in a flight in your budget. The trains take much time, and there are no ferries operational from Mumbai yet. However, if you hop a plane for the weekend, this romantic place near Mumbai will sweep your soulmate off their feet. An idyllic getaway, Diu boasts of old forts and churches overlooking beautiful beaches. Oh, and did I tell you about the caves that you can visit. It’s impossible not to fall in love with this place after watching this video about the Island of Calm. Distance from Mumbai: 822 km Best Time: July to March 21 Diu Attractions View Hotels Read More 12. Karnala Bird Sanctuary, Panvel 4.1 /5 View 12+ photos There’s nothing more peaceful and in so many ways, romantic, than being amidst nature and her beings. The Karnala Bird Sanctuary is one of those places where you can have a romantic plus adventurous experience with your loved one, exploring the park and looking for different bird species. It is home to about 150 species of birds and also a halting point for several species of migratory birds. The park also offers nature trails and is a good place for nature lovers. Distance from Mumbai: 46 km Read More 13. Alibag, Maharashtra - Coconut groves and Sandy Beaches 4.5 /5 View 17+ photos Known For : Alibaug Beach Kolaba Fort Water Sports in Alibaug Probably the most popular weekend getaway from Mumbai, Alibaug, known for its beaches and forts, is also a favourite destination for couples. Being a year-round destination, it’s filled with tourists at almost every given point of time. There are several beaches in Alibaug, but for couples, the beach to be is Thal beach as it is less crowded. Walk hand in hand with your partner, seek blessings at the Birla temple or visit the Alibaug fort, the choice is all yours. Kashid beach, which is not so far from Alibaug is also a good romantic spot to visit if you’re at Alibaug. Distance from Mumbai: 96 km Best Time: November to March 29 Alibag Attractions View Hotels Read More 14. Mahabaleshwar, Maharashtra - The land of Strawberries 4.1 /5 View 20+ photos Known For : Elephant's Head Point Chinaman's Falls Dhobi Waterfall A very popular hill station in Maharashtra, a trip to this place is a must for all couples. The stunning panoramic views of the surrounding evergreen hills and valleys are incomparable to any other sight you’ll ever see. The Venna lake is a must visit place when here. Go for a boat ride with your partner or just take your time exploring this beautiful place. The scenic beauty and peacefulness of Mahabaleshwar make it a popular honeymoon and romantic getaway from Mumbai. Distance from Mumbai: 262 km Best Time: October to June 31 Mahabaleshwar Attractions View Hotels Read More 15. Ganapatipule, Maharashtra - A Ganesha Temple amidst White Sandy Beaches 4.2 /5 View 29+ photos Known For : Jaigad Fort Water Sports in Ganapatipule Swayambhu Ganpati Temple Ganapatipule is a well known, romantic beach destination located in the Ratnagiri district of Maharashtra. It has plenty of beautiful beaches which offer some really stunning views of the sea. The Swayambhu Ganapati temple is also a popular tourist attraction here. The rich cultural and traditional history of Maharashtra is very prominent here. It’s one of the ideal romantic places near Mumbai for couples who just want to take their time relaxing at the beach. Distance from Mumbai: 333 km Best Time: November to February 9 Ganapatipule Attractions View Hotels Read More These absolute romantic hotspots will surely enlighten up the romance between you and your sweetheart.
